      • searchFacetsAndStatistics

        public org.apache.solr.client.solrj.response.QueryResponse searchFacetsAndStatistics(java.lang.String query,
                                                                                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> facetFields,
                                                                                     int facetMinCount,
                                                                                     boolean getFieldStatistics)
                                                                              throws PresentationException,
                                                                                     IndexUnreachableException
        Returns facets for the given facet field list. No actual docs are returned since they aren't necessary.
        Parameters:
        query - The query to use.
        facetFields - List of facet fields.
        facetMinCount -
        getFieldStatistics - If true, field statistics will be generated for every facet field.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        PresentationException
        IndexUnreachableException

      • searchFacetsAndStatistics

        public org.apache.solr.client.solrj.response.QueryResponse searchFacetsAndStatistics(java.lang.String query,
                                                                                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> facetFields,
                                                                                     int facetMinCount,
                                                                                     java.lang.String facetPrefix,
                                                                                     boolean getFieldStatistics)
                                                                              throws PresentationException,
                                                                                     IndexUnreachableException
        Returns facets for the given facet field list. No actual docs are returned since they aren't necessary.
        Parameters:
        query - The query to use.
        facetFields - List of facet fields.
        facetMinCount -
        facetPrefix - The facet field value must start with these characters. Ignored if null or blank
        getFieldStatistics - If true, field statistics will be generated for every facet field.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        PresentationException
        IndexUnreachableException

        Parameters:

        splitFieldsBy - String by which the individual field configurations are split

      • getMetadataValuesForLanguage

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getMetadataValuesForLanguage(org.apache.solr.common.SolrDocument doc,
                                                                                                            java.lang.String key)
        Parameters:
        doc - The document containing the metadata
        key - the metadata key without the '_LANG_...' suffix
        Returns:
        A map with keys for each language and lists of all found metadata values for this language. Metadata that match the given key but have no language information are listed as language _DEFAULT

      • getMetadataValuesForLanguage

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getMetadataValuesForLanguage(StructElement doc,
                                                                                                            java.lang.String key)
        Parameters:
        doc - The document containing the metadata
        key - the metadata key without the '_LANG_...' suffix
        Returns:
        A map with keys for each language and lists of all found metadata values for this language. Metadata that match the given key but have no language information are listed as language _DEFAULT

      • getFilename

        public java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getFilename(java.lang.String pi,
                                                        int order)
                                                 throws PresentationException,
                                                        IndexUnreachableException
        Catches the filename of the page with the given order under the given ip
        Parameters:
        pi - The topstruct pi
        order - The page order (1-based
        Returns:
        An optíonal containing the filename of the page with the given order under the given ip. Or an empty optional if no matching page was found.
        Throws:
        IndexUnreachableException
        PresentationException
